alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 3:11PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lincoln County through 400 PM CDT... At 310 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Lincoln, or 8 miles southwest of Brookhaven, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Brookhaven around 325 PM CDT. Bogue Chitto around 330 PM CDT. Enterprise around 340 PM CDT. East Lincoln around 350 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
